name: Pizza Fly
description:
☆ PIZZA FLY ☆
what is more joyous than pizza to a fly?

Pizza fly is a fully immersive role-playing game that finally allows you to fulfill your life-long dream of becoming a fly. 


Walk left, walk right, and jump.
You can do it all, baby.

a pygame game with:

☆unlimited gameplay
☆no real end goal
☆one (1) very cute little bug
